page.title: Thank you for playing!
page.text: Developed by (!bold/Poggers Gang):(!line)Artemiy Kopych - Director, Supervisor(!line)PersonFromBrazil - Animator, Illustrator, Composer(!line)Rem - Animator, Illustrator(!line)Masker - Animator(!line)Gontale - Bonus 2 and 3 Animator(!line)InklingCurry - Animator(!line)Maxicc - Composer(!line)Alex Ivan - Composer(!line)donut hoolie - Designer(!line)GasterDoggo - Designer, Artist(!line)Elenaker - Concept Artist(!line)The Thing - Illustrator(!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line)Special thanks to BBoxer, Isaac Huddleston, IagoAnims and MagicBunnyStar!

page.title: Modding build created by Rem!
page.text: Incredibox Modding Build created with passion by (!color/#64b1e8/(!bold/Rem))! Love creative mods and unique sounds? Support her work and explore more on her channel! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@rin.Incredibox//Rem's Channel)

page.title: INCREDIBOX BY SO FAR SO GOOD!
page.text: And of course the official developers of Incredibox, (!bold/Allan), (!bold/Romain) and Incredible (!bold/Polo)! Without them, this project wouldn't exist! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line)Buy Official Incredibox for more fun and to support the team!(!line)(!line)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com//Incredibox Website)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com/info/store/Buy Incredibox)
